# Code Review Guidelines for ai-hub-tracking

This document guides reviewers (human or AI) assessing **IaC and CI/CD code** in this repo: GitHub Actions workflows, Terraform IaC, Bash scripts, and Azure Verified Modules (AVM) setup.

---

## Use the Authoritative Skills Files

This repository uses **skill profiles** to define standards for different types of work. Refer to these as the source of truth:

### [IaC Code Reviewer](../skills/iac-code-reviewer/SKILLS.md) - PRIMARY REFERENCE
Use this for reviewing Terraform, GitHub Actions, Bash scripts, and AVM changes.
- Review goals and severity levels
- Azure Landing Zone compliance (CRITICAL)
- Terraform standards with full checklists
- GitHub Actions and Bash standards
- Complete review checklist with severity assignments
